Game.Title: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare®
Game.Description:
Includes:
- Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® - Custom in-game Tactical Knife - In-game XRK Weapons Pack
Experience Season 1, available NOW in Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare®. This epic season of content includes powerful new functional weapons, exciting new Multiplayer maps and modes, thrilling new Special Ops experiences and the return of fan-favourite classic content reimagined for Modern Warfare®, such as the Crash Multiplayer map - all for FREE for the entire community!
The stakes have never been higher as players take on the role of lethal Tier One operators in a heart-racing saga that will affect the global balance of power. Developed by the studio that started it all, Infinity Ward delivers an epic reimagining of the iconic Modern Warfare® series from the ground up.
PS4™ Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® players get Special Ops Survival Mode exclusively*.
In-game purchases optional
